attributes.action: Allow Perth and Kinross to have a referendum
attributes.additional_details: I believe that if in any future Scottish independence referendum Scotland votes to leave the UK that the region of Perth and Kinross should be allowed a referendum on being part of an independent Scotland or remaining of the UK.
attributes.background: If Scotland in any future Scottish independence referendum votes to leave the UK the region of Perth and Kinross should be allowed a referendum on being part of an independent Scotland or remaining part of the UK.

rejection.details:
A number of attempts have been made to start petitions making requests similar to this petition, using what appear to be fake names and email addresses.

We can only consider a petition if the creator has started it using their full, legal name, so if you would like to proceed with your petition please can you contact us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk so we can verify your identity.
